name: Leaxcoin
description: Away with all the real estate transaction problems! A strong currency in the world! Leaxcoin is a decentralized global currency that adopts the Ethereum blockchain technology, the leader in the smart contract evolution. The Leaxcoin platform comes up with the solution to all the problems with real estate transactions, either in the purchase, rent, lease and real estate launch or in the property registry. The success of the Leaxcoin platform will be totally achieved with a global community of real estate specialists and experienced developers, who will create the necessary tools to connect all the real estate processes and the regulatory agencies of property registration for a blockchain, everything in compliance with the countless jurisdictions of every country, state and city.
